thread.title: Philadelphia Clears Two Opioid Tent Camps

author: Jon Kamp
title: Philadelphia Clears Two Opioid Tent Camps
text:
Philadelphia authorities on Wednesday cleared two tent camps where opioid users congregated, capping a monthlong effort to move people into treatment and shelters.
Four tunnels filled with tents and mattresses beneath a freight railway have become highly visible symbols of the city’s drug problem, spilling out into Philadelphia’s Kensington neighborhood. Deeming the tunnels health and safety hazards, the city cleared two of them as part of a pilot project.
...
